title: no lowercase æ in T-Star Mono Round?
content:
Hi everybody,  
is it just me? Or is there no lowercase æ in T-Star Mono Round? And in this sample .PDF i can't seem to locate the uppercase Ø.

Can anyone tell me if this is true? I don't have it, so i can't check it for myself.

[http://www.gestalten.com:8080/shop/images/upload/fonts/933/13472f\_10736d...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130801075834/http:/www.gestalten.com:8080/shop/images/upload/fonts/933/13472f_10736d729a2_-7fc5.pdf "http://www.gestalten.com:8080/shop/images/upload/fonts/933/13472f\_10736d729a2\_-7fc5.pdf")

Thanks.
author: csjDK

comments.content: I know it has both O slash characters but have not seen a lower case æ in use.

[T-Star Mono at FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20130801075834/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/gestalten/tstar_mono_round_ot/?&sample_text=%C3%98%C3%B8%C5%92%C5%93%C3%86%C3%A6%3F&update=0): looks like something's missing.
